statements: SELECT * FROM MarketingMetrics
SELECT campaign_name, impressions, clicks, revenue FROM MarketingMetrics
SELECT id, conversions FROM MarketingMetrics ORDER BY conversions DESC
SELECT campaign_name, clicks FROM MarketingMetrics WHERE impressions > 1000
SELECT * FROM MarketingMetrics WHERE revenue > 500 ORDER BY revenue
SELECT campaign_name, impressions, clicks, conversions, revenue FROM MarketingMetrics WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT campaign_name, clicks, impressions, revenue, conversions FROM MarketingMetrics WHERE conversions > 50 ORDER BY clicks ASC
SELECT id, campaign_name, revenue FROM MarketingMetrics WHERE revenue < 500.00 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT campaign_name, conversions FROM MarketingMetrics WHERE impressions > 1000 ORDER BY conversions DESC
SELECT id, revenue, campaign_name FROM MarketingMetrics WHERE conversions BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM marketing_metrics;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM marketing_metrics ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT trend_name FROM marketing_trends WHERE trend_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM marketing_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM marketing_trends WHERE trend_description LIKE '%growth%' ORDER BY trend_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100 ORDER BY metric_name DESC;
SELECT trend_id, trend_name FROM marketing_trends WHERE trend_description LIKE '%analysis%' ORDER BY trend_name ASC;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM marketing_metrics WHERE metric_value BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM marketing_trends WHERE trend_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY trend_name ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT trend_name, COUNT(*) AS trend_count FROM marketing_trends GROUP BY trend_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY trend_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM MarketingMetrics;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM MarketingMetrics WHERE id = 1;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM MetricTrends ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT decision_maker, decision_date FROM DecisionMaking WHERE decision_id = 5;
SELECT id, metric_name, metric_value, date_collected FROM MarketingMetrics ORDER BY date_collected ASC;
SELECT * FROM MarketingMetrics ORDER BY date_collected DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM MarketingMetrics WHERE metric_value > 100 AND date_collected BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT trend_name, trend_description, start_date, end_date FROM MetricTrends WHERE end_date > '2022-06-30' ORDER BY start_date LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM DecisionMaking WHERE decision_maker LIKE '%John%' AND decision_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT decision_id, decision_description FROM DecisionMaking ORDER BY decision_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM marketing_metrics ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT metric_name, value FROM marketing_metrics WHERE id=1;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description, end_date FROM marketing_trends WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT channel_name FROM marketing_channels WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_metrics ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT metric_name, value FROM marketing_metrics WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY value DESC
SELECT * FROM marketing_channels WHERE channel_name LIKE 'Email%'
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 50000 AND start_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT trend_name, trend_description, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_trends
SELECT * FROM Reports;
SELECT report_name, report_description FROM Reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT report_name, report_date FROM Reports WHERE report_id > 3;
SELECT metric_name, metric_description, metric_category FROM Metrics JOIN Trends ON metric_id = trend_id;
SELECT decision_name, decision_date FROM DecisionMaking WHERE decision_impact = 'high';
SELECT * FROM Reports ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT report_name, report_description FROM Reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT DISTINCT report_name, report_date FROM Reports WHERE report_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM Metrics WHERE metric_category = 'Financial' ORDER BY metric_id ASC
SELECT decision_name, decision_date, decision_impact FROM DecisionMaking WHERE decision_impact = 'High'
